However, as happened with my Pokemon interactive, it seemed an even better idea to expand the focus and make it such that the story covered the entirety of Birth by Sleep, including Aqua's compatriots Terra and Ventus and possibly others.

Now, as for content, we're pretty much going completely balls-to-the-wall with this one. The main objective is weight gain, but a number of extra fetishes are both allowed and encouraged, chief among them being GTS/GT, futanari, and burping/farting, and there's pretty much NO limit on how far you can go in terms of sexual content. Nudity, crazed debauched sex left and right, female AND male weight gain, growing bigger than the whole universe, insertion and/or eating of keyblades, eating out of belly buttons, chugging mass amounts of ice cream and belching sonic booms...no matter how freaking insane, go for it! So long as inflation and toilet stuff are excluded (and seriously, I can't stress that enough), the sky's the limit!

I must also stress, though, that we're aiming as much for quality as quantity. No one-line chapters, no stupid non-sequitur chapters that don't follow from the events before them, chapters containing any of the excluded content listed above, extreme OOC-ness that undermines a plot...anything of that sort will not be welcome here! Try your best to write something that not only fulfills your fetishes, but also follows a coherent storyline and contributes to the overall experience.

Now, this story is limited to characters and settings from Birth by Sleep, but if it takes off, who knows-- we may expand things to the other games. Otherwise, please feel free to dive in and give it a try!
